ggplot to image filepath Taken from code here: https://github.com/rstudio/gt/blob/6312cf5be92fae41633b5df7d41aa948b850aaf8/R/image.R#L351C1-L392C2

gg_to_image.Rd

ggplot to image filepath Taken from code here: https://github.com/rstudio/gt/blob/6312cf5be92fae41633b5df7d41aa948b850aaf8/R/image.R#L351C1-L392C2

Usage

gg_to_image(plot_object, fig_dim = c(5, 8), path = getwd())

Arguments

plot_object

ggplot object

fig_dim

vector containing figure height and width in inches. Defaults to c(5,8) - docorator defaults

path

file path including the png location to save the output to

Value

filepath to snap of ggplot
